short_summary: Installation of the New Main Service Replacement Feed Secondary at the Northern Forestry Centre in Edmonton, AB, at the request of Natural Resources Canada (NRCAN) from Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
description: Installation of the new main service transformer from EPCOR, new for the foresterie centre in Edmonton, AB. See full call for details.
full_summary:
# Electrical Services – Secondary Cable Installation
**Tender Number:** WS4097887128
**Reference Number:** 23240-231072

## Announcement Details
- **Publication Date:** July 13, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** August 1, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** Flexible, as per contract details
- **Expected Contract End Date:** July 13, 2024
- **Status:** Expired

## Project Overview
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Natural Resources Canada (NRCAN) is seeking tenders for the installation of a new main service replacement feed secondary at the Northern Forestry Centre in Edmonton, Alberta.

## Installation and Requirements
The project involves installation of five (5) runs of secondary conductors with five (5) conduit stubs. EPCOR Utilities will supply the conductors, transformers, and other required materials.

## Tender and Selection Criteria
The tender is open to all qualified suppliers. The selection criteria will be based on "Lowest Price." All required tender documents and supporting materials must be submitted by August 1, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT.

## Contact Information
\\
- **Name:** Matthew Virakorn (SPAC/PWGSC)
- **Email:** matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Phone:** Not provided
- **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16866850?extsite=MTY4NjY4NTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
